titles.title: Respect for Native Americans in Professional Sports Act of 2015
To make the antitrust laws applicable to professional sports leagues that use, or promote or allow member teams or franchisees to use, the term "Redskins" or the term "Redskin".
Respect for Native Americans in Professional Sports Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Regulatory Reform, Commercial And Antitrust Law.

bill.summary:
Respect for Native Americans in Professional Sports Act of 2015
This bill applies the antitrust laws to a professional sports league that uses, or promotes or allows a member team or franchisee to use or promote the use of, "Redskins" or "Redskin" in connection with such league or a team or franchise connected with such league.
